CustomField.description: This checkbox is automatically selected when the value 'Other' is included in the Partner Associations Membership multi-select picklist. It is used to control the visibility of the 'Other' details field on the page layout.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox indicates that 'Other' has been selected in the Partner Associations Membership picklist. It is used for conditional visibility to display additional details when applicable. Users do not need to update this field manually.
CustomField.label: Partner Associations Membership Is Other
